flawed_nl_solution:
He loses 60*0.1=<<60*0.1=6.0>>6.0 bars to taxes
That means he has 60-6.0=<<60-6.0=54.0>>54.0 bars after taxes
So he has 54.0/2=<<54.0/2=72.0>>72.0 bars after the divorce

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27.0, not 72.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
